LanguageData.DeadEyeTraits_Westerado.degreeDatas.0.de: [PAWN_nameDef] is a descendant of the legendary 'Harlow', which greatly predisposes [PAWN_objective] to firearms.
LanguageData.DeadEyeTraits_Westerado.degreeDatas.1.de: [PAWN_nameDef] has a dead eye. This, apparently, increases firearm skills.
LanguageData.DollarTrilogyTraits_Westerado.degreeData: [PAWN_nameDef] was born with a pretty face, and a fast gun-hand.
[PAWN_nameDef] is just a generally bad person. This subtly repels others during social interactions.
[PAWN_nameDef] is ugly. More so in character than looks, but also looks. Lazy, quick to anger, deceptive, and gluttonous are all descriptions that would befit [PAWN_objective].
